name: Larkwell Martinez Pickaxe
description: The Larkwell Martinez Pickaxe is the Workshop equivalent of aPlatinum Pickaxe, allowing Prospectors to mine higher tier metals (Aluminium Ore,Platinum Ore, etc) at earlier stages of a Prospect while increasing yield. Similar to theInaris "Neves" Pickaxe, the Larkwell Martinez Pickaxe reduces the over-encumbrance penalty by 10% when equipped.
crafted_at: Workshop Repair Kitat a poweredRepair Bench
